name: Nap Time
description: It is a journey of a red panda sleeping on a tree branch, when all of a sudden the branch breaks and this is where the player comes in and guides the red panda for a perfect spot to sleep again. Traversing through each level, the player faces a series of obstacles preventing the panda from progressing into the game. Power ups can be collected to enhance the players experience thorough-out the levels. These types of games are typically categorized in the platform genre. There are thousands of similar games as ours, however it's going to be a challenge to stand out amongst other games.
